document.full_text: the heads of bailed-out mortgage finance giants fannie mae  and freddie mac  were paid fat salaries without proper written procedures or analysis, according to a report published by the inspector general of the federal housing finance agency (fhfa-oig).
document.title: report critical of pay practices at fannie mae, freddie mac
lines_and_colors: the heads of bailed-out mortgage finance giants fannie mae  and freddie mac  were paid fat salaries without proper written procedures or analysis, according to a report published by the inspector general of the federal housing finance agency (fhfa-oig).
